field.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?> <listings> <advertisement id="1"> <service> <name>NCSU-NICT Optical Circuit Transit Service</name> <details> <source_location scheme="IPv4" value="10.1.2.3/32" /> <source_location scheme="IPv4" value="10.10.10.65/32" /> <source_location scheme="IPv6" value="192.168.2.1/32" /> <source_format scheme="transport media" value="optical circuit" /> <destination_location scheme="IPv4" value="154.14.54.0/24" /> <destination_format scheme="transport media" value="optical circuit" /> </details> <description> Optical Circuit Transit Service from NCSU to NICT </description> </service> <price method="Bitcoin" value="1200" amount="20" unit="minutes" url=""/> <providerID> ACME Systems </providerID> <purchasePortal> <destination_location scheme="UDPv4" value="127.0.0.1:4040" /> </purchasePortal> <provisioningParameters> <configurableParameters> <wavelength unit="nanometer" value="1470, 1490, 1510, 1530, 1550" /> </configurableParameters> </provisioningParameters> </advertisement> </listings>
